labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Windows 10 Professional x64 - Fall Creators Update
data.actual_result: Mini Profile stays, not wanting to close in any way by clicking outside of the box.
data.short_description: Mini user profile refuses to close.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a user. (Can be with or without Spotify as their status. - Click on to open their profile. - Click on Mutual Friends. - Close the friend's profile - Attempt to close away the first user's mini profile.
